DOC.brief_title: Obstetric Complications Women Who Smoke During Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective study use McGill University Obstetrics Neonatal database ( MOND ) . This comprehensive database contain detail woman deliver McGill University Health Center Montreal Canada . Details woman deliver McGill University 2001-2007 retrieve anonymously MOND database ( McGill University Obstetrics Neonatal database ) . Women divide 2 group accord smoking status pregnancy . Obstetric complication record group . Statistic test would apply order assess relation smoke Obstetrical complication .
